name: answer_geo.asnstr
script: if ( doc['answer_geo.asn'].size() == 0 || doc['answer_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() == 0 ) { return 'ASN: Not Available' } else { return 'ASN' + doc['answer_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['answer_geo.as_org.keyword'].value }

name: destination_geo.asnstr
script: if ( doc['destination_geo.asn'].size() == 0 || doc['destination_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() == 0 ) { return 'ASN: Not Available' } else { return 'ASN' + doc['destination_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['destination_geo.as_org.keyword'].value }

name: source_geo.asnstr
script: if ( doc['source_geo.asn'].size() == 0 || doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() == 0 ) { return 'ASN: Not Available' } else { return 'ASN' + doc['source_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword'].value }
